resources.string: Founded in 1800 by the enterprising brothers Carlos and Carolina, Pink Shoe Store is today the largest fashion women\'s footwear retail brand in X America, bringing together concept, high quality and contemporary design. The brand\'s consolidation in the domestic market can also be seen in its history of awards: elected seven times Best Franchise in X in the Clothing, Footwear and Accessories Segment (Small Companies and Grandes Neg√≥cios magazine); Choose your favorite Pink Shoe, we\'re waiting for you.
Click the button to check out our list of shoes. You can also add your used shoes for sale. Add and then talk to us
